Summary: Overall great stay @ Element Irvine. The rooms were clean and nicely decorated. The hotel staff has been friendly and helpful.   However, someone should talk to the morning cook about providing unbiased service to all guest. Upon  arrival we asked for 3 fried eggs and he says can only make 2 and direct us to the steam eggs. We read and understand the there was a sign that says no omelette service  but no sign indicating maximum amount of eggs per order/guest. (Policy/rule) no biggie.   Secondly; I ordered another item and said thank you! Few moments later, the cook replies say please in front of the entire lobby.   I do not understand why I need to beg for eggs in the morning if I’m a guest and it is your job. There were clearly other guest who didn’t say “please” and  there was

Summary Heading: Not what returning customers expect from Element and Westin
Summary: Road warriors beware.  Physically an Element but not in spirit.  Paper thin walls have me writing this review in the middle of the night rather than sleeping.  Buggy new construction, such as hot and cold confusingly upside down in the shower.  Ignored my loyalty profile information.  Odd location reduces convenience.
Manager Response: Hi Rebeccah,  I'm so sorry to hear of your experience at our new hotel. While we stive to provide the highest level of quality and service, it is unfortunate that we fell short of that during your stay. Your comments and feedback will be shared with our team, but please contact the hotel directly so we can gain further details and hope to resolve any possible construction defaults. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and we hope you have a wonderful day.   Happy Holidays!

Summary: A new Element property in Irvine. It worked well enough for us for a few months. Here's what we put in the thank you card with an extra tip and chocolates.  "To the wonderful Element Irvine Staff,  Thanks for all you have done so far to help us feel comfortable during our stay and to bring us calm during this difficult housing transition period! We’ll be out of town for a few days, and then back again for a bit before we check out. Please accept this small gift as a token of our gratitude for all you’ve done to make us feel at home here during our stay.  All of the staff, especially Stephanie, Liliana, and José, were very helpful and really made this hotel feel like a home away from home. We especially appreciated: - Stephanie’s amazing patience and focus to help us find the
Room tip: There is a secret conference room you can reserve for meetings - ask Stephanie in sales or the...
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words and for taking the time to post a review. It was an absolute pleasure to have you both (and Max) with us and allow us the chance to be your home away from home for a few months. As one of our very first long-term guests, we enjoyed getting to see your friendly faces each day, and the team much appreciated the thank you gift. We hope you're doing well and have a very happy holiday season!  Take care!

Summary Heading: Fantastic hotel! Great value and wonderful staff!
Summary: Such a great find! Amazing staff, gorgeous rooms and great breakfast! Plus dog friendly!  Will certainly be back for business and pleasure! Also free parking! We were so surprised at the quality of this hotel. Fantastic value and thoroughly recommended!
Manager Response: Hello injoy8,   Thank you so much for staying with us at the brand-new Element Irvine! We appreciate you taking the time to post a review of your stay, and for your kind words about the hotel and our staff. We look forward to having you back soon!  Have a wonderful day!

Summary: Have had mostly positive experiences with the Element brand and decided to try this spot. Really enjoyed our stay.   Pluses: It's a new(ish) hotel and everything was well maintained and clean. Rooms were very clean. We were only there for one night, but it has the feel of an extended stay place for business travelers, with a cooktop, fridge, plates, silverware, etc.   It is quite close distance wise from the Santa Ana airport and I didn't quite notice HOW close until after I booked the spot, but plane noise was minimal - I'm a pretty light sleeper and I couldn't hear anything disruptive.   Clean, not-spooky, well lit parking area. Friendly employees, from front desk to kitchen staff to the handsome bartender.   There really isn't a minus at all, and as casual travelers we'll
Manager Response: Hello PJCoastToCoast,   Thank you so much for staying with us at the brand-new Element Irvine! We appreciate your detailed information and kind review. We take pride in our service and new property, so we are glad to see that it shows to our guests. We look forward to any future travels that brings you back to the Element Irvine, and we hope to see you again soon!  Have a wonderful day!
